mapper.select: select x1.ybh,y.sbbh,x1.xzjlbh, r.rzname,b.bmmc ,x1.xzjljbgz,x1.szjlsj ,z.zwmc, x5.xzysmc,x5.xzysje from xingzijilubiao x1 inner join yuangongbiao y on x1.ybh=y.ybh inner join xinzijibengongzibiao x2 on y.zwbh=x2.zwbh inner join rencaizibiao r on y.rzbh=r.rzbh inner join zhiweibiao z on y.zwbh=z.zwbh inner join bumenbiao b on z.bmbh=b.bmbh inner join xinzijiluzibiao x3 on x3.xzjlbh=x1.xzjlbh inner join xinzizhongjianbiao x4 on x4.xzzjbh=x3.xzzjbh inner join xinziyaosuxiangbiao x5 on x5.xzysbh=x4.xzysbh where DATE_FORMAT(x1.szjlsj,'%Y%m')=DATE_FORMAT(CURDATE(),'%Y%m')
select count(xzsj) as kqCount from kaoqinjilubiao where (kqsbzt=1 or kqxbzt=1 and DATE_FORMAT(xzsj,'%Y%m')=DATE_FORMAT(CURDATE(),'%Y%m')) and ybh=#{ybh}

select sbjsje,sbjnbl from shebaojishubiao sb inner join sbzjb sb2 on sb.sbjsbh=sb2.sbjsbh inner join shebaofananbiao sb3 on sb2.sbbh=sb3.sbbh inner join yuangongbiao y on sb3.sbbh=y.sbbh where y.ybh=#{ybh}
select count(xzsj) as kqCount2 from kaoqinjilubiao where (kqsbzt=2 or kqxbzt=2 and DATE_FORMAT(xzsj,'%Y%m')=DATE_FORMAT(CURDATE(),'%Y%m')) and ybh=#{ybh}
select count(xzsj) as kqCount3 from kaoqinjilubiao where (kqsbzt=3 or kqxbzt=3 and DATE_FORMAT(xzsj,'%Y%m')=DATE_FORMAT(CURDATE(),'%Y%m')) and ybh=#{ybh}

select datediff(jqsqjssj,jqsqkssj) as shijia from jiaqishenqibiao j inner join kaoqinjiaqilxbiao l on j.kqjqbh=l.kqjqbh inner join shenhejilubiao s on s.shjlbh=j.shjlbh where kqjqlx=1 and s.ybh=#{ybh} and DATE_FORMAT(jqsqjssj,'%Y%m')=DATE_FORMAT(CURDATE(),'%Y%m')

select datediff(jqsqjssj,jqsqkssj) as bingjia from jiaqishenqibiao j inner join kaoqinjiaqilxbiao l on j.kqjqbh=l.kqjqbh inner join shenhejilubiao s on s.shjlbh=j.shjlbh where kqjqlx=2 and s.ybh=#{ybh} and DATE_FORMAT(jqsqjssj,'%Y%m')=DATE_FORMAT(CURDATE(),'%Y%m')

select x1.ybh,y.sbbh,x1.xzjlbh,x1.szjlsj as xzsj, r.rzname,b.bmmc ,x1.xzjljbgz,x1.szjlsj ,z.zwmc, x5.xzysmc,x5.xzysje from xingzijilubiao x1 inner join yuangongbiao y on x1.ybh=y.ybh inner join xinzijibengongzibiao x2 on y.zwbh=x2.zwbh inner join rencaizibiao r on y.rzbh=r.rzbh inner join zhiweibiao z on y.zwbh=z.zwbh inner join bumenbiao b on z.bmbh=b.bmbh inner join xinzijiluzibiao x3 on x3.xzjlbh=x1.xzjlbh inner join xinzizhongjianbiao x4 on x4.xzzjbh=x3.xzzjbh inner join xinziyaosuxiangbiao x5 on x5.xzysbh=x4.xzysbh where (DATE_FORMAT(x1.szjlsj,'%Y-%m')=#{szjlsj})
select count(xzsj) as kqCount from kaoqinjilubiao where ((kqsbzt=1 or kqxbzt=1) and DATE_FORMAT(xzsj,'%Y-%m')=#{xzsj}) and ybh=#{ybh}
select count(xzsj) as kqCount2 from kaoqinjilubiao where ((kqsbzt=2 or kqxbzt=2) and DATE_FORMAT(xzsj,'%Y-%m')=#{xzsj}) and ybh=#{ybh}
select count(xzsj) as kqCount3 from kaoqinjilubiao where ((kqsbzt=3 or kqxbzt=3) and DATE_FORMAT(xzsj,'%Y-%m')=#{xzsj}) and ybh=#{ybh}

select x1.ybh,y.sbbh,x1.xzjlbh,x1.szjlsj as xzsj, r.rzname,b.bmmc ,x1.xzjljbgz,x1.szjlsj ,z.zwmc, x5.xzysmc,x5.xzysje from xingzijilubiao x1 inner join yuangongbiao y on x1.ybh=y.ybh inner join xinzijibengongzibiao x2 on y.zwbh=x2.zwbh inner join rencaizibiao r on y.rzbh=r.rzbh inner join zhiweibiao z on y.zwbh=z.zwbh inner join bumenbiao b on z.bmbh=b.bmbh inner join xinzijiluzibiao x3 on x3.xzjlbh=x1.xzjlbh inner join xinzizhongjianbiao x4 on x4.xzzjbh=x3.xzzjbh inner join xinziyaosuxiangbiao x5 on x5.xzysbh=x4.xzysbh where DATE_FORMAT(x1.szjlsj,'%Y%m')=DATE_FORMAT(CURDATE(),'%Y%m') and b.bmmc like "%" #{bmmc} "%"

select x1.ybh,y.sbbh,x1.xzjlbh,x1.szjlsj as xzsj, r.rzname,b.bmmc ,x1.xzjljbgz,x1.szjlsj ,z.zwmc, x5.xzysmc,x5.xzysje from xingzijilubiao x1 inner join yuangongbiao y on x1.ybh=y.ybh inner join xinzijibengongzibiao x2 on y.zwbh=x2.zwbh inner join rencaizibiao r on y.rzbh=r.rzbh inner join zhiweibiao z on y.zwbh=z.zwbh inner join bumenbiao b on z.bmbh=b.bmbh inner join xinzijiluzibiao x3 on x3.xzjlbh=x1.xzjlbh inner join xinzizhongjianbiao x4 on x4.xzzjbh=x3.xzzjbh inner join xinziyaosuxiangbiao x5 on x5.xzysbh=x4.xzysbh where DATE_FORMAT(x1.szjlsj,'%Y%m')=DATE_FORMAT(CURDATE(),'%Y%m') and r.rzname like "%" #{rzname} "%"

select x1.ybh,y.sbbh,x1.xzjlbh,x1.szjlsj as xzsj, r.rzname,b.bmmc ,x1.xzjljbgz,x1.szjlsj ,z.zwmc, x5.xzysmc,x5.xzysje from xingzijilubiao x1 inner join yuangongbiao y on x1.ybh=y.ybh inner join xinzijibengongzibiao x2 on y.zwbh=x2.zwbh inner join rencaizibiao r on y.rzbh=r.rzbh inner join zhiweibiao z on y.zwbh=z.zwbh inner join bumenbiao b on z.bmbh=b.bmbh inner join xinzijiluzibiao x3 on x3.xzjlbh=x1.xzjlbh inner join xinzizhongjianbiao x4 on x4.xzzjbh=x3.xzzjbh inner join xinziyaosuxiangbiao x5 on x5.xzysbh=x4.xzysbh where y.ybh=#{ybh}
